definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: smear, anoint (NH id.; orig. prob. as Ar. masah.a wipe orstroke with the hand  (cf. RS:Sem. i. 215; 2nd ed., 283), anoint, Aram.m4ah. [[מְשַׁח]] anoint; on [[משת]], id. (?) in Aram. inscr. v. CIS:ii.1. No.145, C, 1; Palm. [[משחא]] oil Vog:No.16; Eth. masah.a: anoint, feast, dine Di:Lex 176; (As.mašâḫu is measure; Aram. [[מְשַׁת]] id.; Ar. ms0h.h; measurement, cf. Dl:Prol. 178 Frä:282));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[מ]] Nu 3:25 + 2 t.; sf. [[מְשָֽׁחְֲ]] Ps 45:8, 1Sa 10:1; [[מְשָׁחוֹ]] 2Ch 22:7; 2 ms. [[מָשַׁחְתָּ]] Ge 31:13 + 12 t., + 9 t. Pf.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִמְשַׁח]] Le 16:32 + 6 t.; 3 mpl. [[יִמְשָָׁחוּ]] Am 6:6, + 13 t. Impf.; Imv. sf. [[מְשָׁחֵהוּ]] 1Sa 16:12; pl. [[מִשְׁחוּ]] Is 21:5; Inf. abs. [[מָשׁוֹחַ]] Je 22:14; cstr. [[מְשׁׂחַ]] Ju Jdg 9:8, Da 9:24 + Ho 8:3 LXX We GASm Now; [[מָשְׁחָה]] Ex 29:29; sf. [[מְשֽׁחְֳ]]1Sa 15:1 (Baer); [[מָשְׁחוֹ]] Le 7:36; [[מָשְׁחָתָם]] Ex 40:15; Pt. pl. [[משְׁחִים]] Ju Jdg 9:15; pass. [[מָשׁוּחַ]] 2Sa 3:39 (We suggests deriv. from [[שׁח]], defect. [[משׁח]] ([[מֻשַׁח]]), wrongly read as [[מָשֻׁחַ]]; or by transposition [[משׁוח]] may have been mistaken for an unexampled [[מוּשַׁח]] Hoph. Pt. of [[שׁוח]]); [[מָשִׁיחַ]] 2Sa 1:21 (but rd. [[מָשֻׁח]] (or [[נמשׁח]]) Codd. We Dr Kit Bu HPS); pl. [[מְשֻׁחִים]] Ex 29:2 + 4 t;—

smear, house with colour (paint) Je 22:14; shield with oil (anoint) Is 21:5, 2Sa 1:21 (cf. Dr; Gr [[כְּלִי מָשׁוּחַ]] weapon anointed; Peters:JBL 893, 56 [[כְּלֵי מָשׁוּחַ]] weapons of one (the king) anointed); the person, with ointments Am 6:6; unleavened cakes, with oil Ex 29:2, Le 2:4, Nu 6:15 (P).

anoint, as consecration, solemn setting apart to an office, always by the use of oil poured on the head: [[לנביא]] as a prophet 1Ki 19:16 (Elisha by Elijah) Is 61:1; elsewh. of king, c. acc., [[מֶלֶח]] Ju Jdg 9:8 (E), so Ho 8:3 reading [[מִמְּשׁׂחַ מֶלֶח]] (for MT ´[[מִמַּשָּׂא מ]]) We GASm Now; also Ho 7:3 reading [[יִמְשְׁחוּ]] (for MT [[יְשַׂמְּחוּ]]) We Now; elsewhere acc. pers. 1Sa 16:3, 1Sa 16:12, 1Sa 16:13, 1Ki 1:39, 2Ki 11:12, 2Ki 23:30, 2Ch 22:7, 2Ch 23:11; [[בְּשֶׁמֶן קָדְשִׁי]] Ps 89:21 with my holy oil; [[שׁמן שָׂשׂוֹן]] Ps 45:8 (fig.); c. [[על]], 2Sa 19:11 whom we have anointed over us; [[לְמֶלֶח]] 1Ki 1:45, 1Ki 5:15; c. [[עַל]], [[לְמֶלֶח]] Ju Jdg 9:15, 2Sa 2:4, 2Sa 2:7, 1Ki 19:15; [[על ישׂראל]] over Israel 1Sa 15:1, 1Sa 15:17, 2Sa 5:3 = 1Ch 11:3, 2Sa 5:17, 2Sa 12:7, 1Ki 1:34, 1Ki 19:16; [[אֶל־ישׂראל]] 2Ki 9:3, 2Ki 9:6, 2Ki 9:12 (Ephr.); [[לנגיד]] 1Ch 29:22; [[על]] 1Sa 9:16, 1Sa 10:1; [[מָשׁוּחַ מֶלֶח]] 2Sa 3:39 (? v. supr.)

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Aaronic priests, only P, c. acc. pers. Ex 28:41, Ex 29:7, Ex 30:30, Ex 40:13, Ex 40:15, Ex 40:15, Ex 40:15, Le 7:36, Le 8:12, Le 16:32; abs. Ex 29:29; [[הכהנים הַמְּשֻׁחִים]] Nu 3:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sacred things: [[מַצֵּבָה]] Ge 31:13 (E); tabernacle and its sacred vessels Ex 29:36, Ex 30:26, Ex 40:9, Ex 40:10, Ex 40:11, Le 8:10, Le 8:11 (all P); [[קדשׁ קדשׁים]] Da 9:24.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִמְשַׁח]] 1Ch 14:8; Inf. [[הִמָּשַׁח]] Le 6:13 + 3 t;—be anointed, [[למלך על כל ישׂראל]] 1Ch 14:8; Aaron and his sons Le 6:13 (P); altar Nu 7:10, Nu 7:84, Nu 7:88.
